nodes.text: Far Pando was a peaceful agrarian planet in the Far Pando system of Hutt Space. It was situated along the Pando Spur hyperlane, an offshoot of the larger Hollastin Run. The planet was under the control of the sentient Yahk-Tosh species.
Far Pando was mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square S-13.
